noun.description: A person who acts on behalf of another person or group.
examples: in the event of illness, a durable power of attorney enabled her nephew to act as her agent

noun.description: A person or thing that takes an active role or produces a specified effect.
examples: universities are usually liberal communities that often view themselves as agents of social change

origin: Late Middle English (in the sense someone or something that produces an effect): from Latin agent- doing, from agere.
